error.message: Call to deprecated constant FILE_STATUS_PERMANENT: Deprecated in drupal:9.3.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal\file\FileInterface::STATUS_PERMANENT or \Drupal\file\FileInterface::setPermanent().
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8.8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
